title: Update the Share/Publish modal or button

requirements.text: Update the ShareModal component and/or the share/publish button in the Header and Footer to improve its appearance, copy, or behavior as directed by the user. Clarify with the user what specific change is needed (e.g., button label, modal content, QR code URL, link copy, styling), and apply the agreed update consistently across all locations where the share/publish trigger appears (Header and Footer).

quotes: I need to change the publish thing

acceptanceCriteria: The share/publish button and/or ShareModal reflect the requested change in both the Header and Footer components.
The ShareModal still opens correctly when the share button is clicked.
No regressions in QR code display or URL copy functionality.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the ShareModal functional â€” QR code generation and clipboard copy must continue to work.
nonGoals: Changing backend product catalog or data models.
Adding new sharing platforms or social integrations.
Modifying any page sections unrelated to the share/publish feature.
